Treatment of bedbugs

The bedbug is a tiny, oval-shaped, brownish-colored parasitic insect that feeds exclusively on the blood of humans or pets. Because they are very small, have nocturnal habits.

Deratisation

These rodents are active during the night, so it will be rare to see them. As soon as you notice the different signs or see one of these rodents, call an expert immediately.

Desinfection
